settings.heading: Discriminative Antioxidant
settings.text: In contrast to conventional antioxidants, hydrogen (H2) displays a unique characteristic by not interacting with other reactive oxygen species (ROS) that serve a physiological purpose at appropriate levels.

settings.heading: Improve cognitive function
settings.text: The molecular hydrogen generated can help increase cellular hydration, improving the water balance in your cells, which can enhance cognitive function.

settings.heading: Increased natural energy
settings.text: Hydrogen-rich water may help support mitochondrial function by reducing oxidative stress and inflammation, leading to higher natural ATP energy production.

settings.title: The Ultimate Upgrade for Your Hydration Routine
settings.text:
"IonBottles are not ordinary water bottles - they're a game-changer for your health and hydration routine."

With hydrogen-rich water that has antioxidant properties, IonBottles offer a convenient way to reduce inflammation, boost energy levels, and potentially improve cognitive function.

settings.title: Reduces Effects of Stress & Anxiety
settings.text: Stress and anxiety can take a toll on the body and mind, but with IonBottles, you can enjoy the benefits of hydrogen-rich water on-the-go.

settings.title: Improve Gut Health & Inflammation
settings.text: IonBottles are designed to deliver hydrogen-rich water that can help to neutralize harmful free radicals and reduce inflammation in the body.

settings.heading: How It Works.
settings.description: How It Works.With the press of the button your H2O is split into hydrogen and oxygen molecules through our patented electrolysis process. The hydrogen H2 gas is released into the water thus creating higher antioxidant (energy-giving) water with maximum bioavailability, while expelling the oxygen and waste gases when vented.

settings.text:
Our glass hydrogen water bottle generates safe & pure molecular hydrogen gas to infuse regular drinking water.

By owning an IonBottles, you will enjoy the benefits of molecular hydrogen in a convenient, portable water bottle.

Our hydrogen water bottles are easy to use - simply fill with water, press the button, wait a few minutes for the hydrogen to infuse, open and enjoy!

Whether you're looking to reduce stress and anxiety, improve cognitive function, or promote overall health and wellness, IonBottles has got you covered.
